text: Ralph Deleon Guerrero Torres (born August 6, 1979) is an American Republican politician from Saipan, Northern Mariana Islands. He was the 9th Governor of the Northern Mariana Islands from the death of governor Eloy Inos on December 28, 2015 until January 9, 2023. He previously served as the 10th Lieutenant Governor. He was elected to this position in the 2014 election. He lost re- election in 2022 to Arnold Palacios. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of the Northern Mariana Islands Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of the Northern Mariana Islands
title: Ralph Torres
